content.detailedDescription: I was 17 years old at the time. on my way to pick up my georgeous little italian date. when i arrived at her house, out in the orchard area of south jersey, a cousin of hers came to the door and said she would take a raincheck on the date because her relatives came in and she would be spending some time with them. so , i left there and drove towards the local diner, in my neck of the woods, { a local hangout }.The road was long and straight with not to many houses on it for miles. im cruising along in my 1956 chevy convertible when it started to miss.It quickly shut off completely. the radio., and parking lights , and dash lights all went off. i put my tranny in neutral, and coasted to a stop. i just stayed in my lane because there was no traffic at all. never was any cars on that road. i checked my gas gauge cause i thought i could be out of gas, then i remembered i had just put 3 dollars worth of gas in itad, to this day before heading out to pick up my date.That was around 9 gallons of gas in them days. that's when i experienced the worst case of fear that i have ever had, to this day.I was looking straight ahead , with both hands on the steering wheel, and i felt that somethace to faceing was sitting next to me in the front seat. i was frozen with fear, all i could do was slowly turn my head to look.I was shaking so bad, but could not move. with my head turned to face the little entity sitting next to me, i saw a small little , what looked to be a chilave an understandindd, looking right at me. and at that moment the fear was replaced with a calmness , that was unlike i had ever known. it was an off white, almost gaseous looking little thing.Its head was barely as high as the back of the seat, and its legs stuck straight out just over the end of the seat. it was very small.By thes time , i am completely calm. it then spoke to me without saying a word. in my mind i heard, don't be afraid . at that time i noticed an expression on its face of a mother looking at her child.We stared at each other for a few minuites, and my mind was on fire with information on many different levels.To fast for me to separate, and focus on any one thing.And then it started to fade , the more transparent it got, the feaat i shouldntr started to settle in on me again. suddenly i was able to move.Just as it was almost completely gone, my dash lights came back on. i looked again and it was gone. scared again, i hit the starter and the car came to life. i put it in gear, and peeled the tires off of it and flew out to the diner. took about 15 more minutes .A couple of my friends were there, but i did,nt mention the experience to them.That was over 50 years ago and ive not told anybody, except for my wife of 48 years, who wouldn't believe even if it had happened to her.Since then i seemed to have an understandind of things that i shouldn't.
content.summary: A grey sat next to me, in my stalled car , comunicated telepathicly with me.

content.detailedDescription: On my mother's back porch, i looked up and saw what i first thought to be a chinese lantern, as i watched it come closer, i noticed it change shape,from a ball like shape into a cylinder like shape, as it did so, seemingly out of no-where, another object, identical to the first appeared to be right behind it. the two were bright burnt orange, with a red hue, and a light radiating from their bottom ends of deep bright red, they followed each other slowly, as one stopped and hovered above our house, the other went a bit away,but waited for the one that stopped. after about three minutes, they both went higher up into the cloud cover and were visually gone.
content.summary: From my mother's back porch, i saw one bright orb, bright orange- like object, seeminglycoming toward my direction, as i first thought it was a lantern or a drone, it change it  became cylinder like, and as it did,another object identical to it was by it

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a photograph of downtown phoenix  . i did not notice this until after i looked at the photo on my phone. could be reflection but not totally convinced that is is. i've tried to recreate it but was not able to. thoughts?
content.summary: Showed up in photograph ... could be reflection but clearly looks 3 dimensional

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting out back of the townhouse condos on the patio.  it was around 9 - 10 pm.  i was facing westerly direction.  i saw what looked like a shooting star going through the sky out of the corner of my eye.  when i turned my head and looked closer toward it and it's path i immediately noticed it didn't have a tail like other shooting stars do from breaking up into the atmosphere etc.  as soon as i saw this it slowed down and even stopped completely in it's path. my jaw dropped.  it stood still in the horizon for what seemed like an instant.  then immediately took off, like something i've never seen before, for an object to appear to be a shooting star in the sky to stop like this, change direction and move like this was again like nothing i've ever seen.  from the way i was facing and the way it moved stopped and continued it would have been flying north of me so north phoenix westbound until it stopped then moved north west. i lost site of it after it took off into the horizon.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It looked like a shooting star but when i looked closer it didn't have a tail and stopped

content.detailedDescription: Driving to my cycling trail this morning, i noticed a bright white orb above sun and clouds. i saw for a minute or so then a second one appeared same size shape and color, the two orbs sat side by side then just disappeared.
content.summary: One white orb, then became two white orbs

content.detailedDescription: at 4:55 a.M.Of august 10 2015 i was standing on my porch observing the moon. suddenly to the east of the moon about one and a half diameters of the moon, from the moon there suddenly appeared a very bright white point of light. i was amazed as i had been looking directly at that area and the point of light seemed to "blink on" at a very great distance from me. after a few seconds the light diverged into four seperate lights of less intensity with the color and brightness of moderate starlight and at once began to move in a irregular diamond shape formation to the south east at a tremendous speed across the sky in a straight line and decending somewhat. as the lights moved the formation changed to a irregular line and changed from a straight line to arc and began to ascend. the lights seemed to seperate from a line to a irregular diamond shape again and appeared to be moving away from me the light then faded out of view. there was no sound or vapor trail there was enough moonlight that i would have been able to see a vaportrail if there was one, or four!!   it was my firm impression from the inital sighting of the four seperate lights that it was controlled flight. i was rather pleasantly amazed that i was witnessing a ufo event!!
content.summary: Witnessed while observing the moon

content.detailedDescription: I went to a movie theater with my family.  it was around 9:00 p.M.  when we exited the theater, i noticed a bright light hovering above the city.  i was stationary, floating in the air, so i knew it wasn't an airplane.  i seemed to be the only witness to this strange light.  after driving 12 miles home, i noticed that the light was above my home.  i watched the light was several seconds.  i then retreated to my house for fear of the light.  p.S.  i believe that this occurrence gave me an implant.
content.summary: Went to a movie theater in the evening, around 9:00.  came out and witnessed a bright light hovering over the city.  no one else noticed the light.  drove 12 miles home and the light followed.

content.detailedDescription:
I was playing in a bar with my jazz band. at one point the audience started standing up and pointing at the sky. after a while we stopped playing and went to check it out. when i looked up i saw dozens of lights in a shape almost rectangular. i got shocked and felt some kind of fear of the unknown. my first reaction was to capture it on film, but my cellphone has low quality so it couldn't capture the small lights, then we tried the iphones, and they still didn't capture it. so we stood there and watched, there were about 30 people on the bar watching it. the formation from my prespective made a rectangule of 5-8 centimeters in the sky, it had a synchronized flux of energy that pulsated down->up. 
the formation started moving really slow and diagonally from sw to s and then moved up. it slightly changed of shape during its course but maitained a synchronized formation. then we were asked by the bar's owner to keep playing, so i didn't get to see it disappear. the next day when i went to check my facebook and a friend of my who is also a musician, was playing on another bar in the same town. he had posted " what are these shiny dots in the sky? ", then i realised we could have about 70 witnesses on this event, just in ferragudo. it was big enough to have been seen from nearby cities.

thanks, joão romão
content.summary: A formation of lights acsenting, pulsating glow down to up. changed shape and unable to film

content.detailedDescription: Its was november almost december 2009. i was about 17 or 18 i was in a car leaving my fathers girlfriend house of the time with my dad driving, my brother in the back sit and me in the passenger sit and we where leaving the city of dorado, puerto rico it was 10pm. i started to see out the window when i saw a black triangle it was sort of like a shadow moving in straight-line no sound no lights. at the same time a black helicopter was fallowing very slow after it, it look like and escort. i lost the object cause the car was moving, two minute pass and another black helicopter flew by bought this one was going fast. at first i immedlty taught that it was a actually a sort of small plane bought it was going to slow to be a plane. i don't know what i saw but that was my event.
content.summary: Triangle, all black follow by two black helicopters.

content.detailedDescription:
In the summer of 1953 i was a five year old boy who lived on cedar street in phenix city, alabama.  cedar street was a dirt road, with very little traffic.  during the day, it was just as likely to see a mule-drawn cart as an automobile.  i pretty much was free to roam the street because most of the houses belonged to relatives.  while phenix city had a notoriously dangerous reputation, cedar street was a safe area.
the street ran east/west.  up the hill to the west was a paved road that split towards eufaula, alabama and towards seale, alabama.  to the east, it ran towards the chattahoochie river.
on this particular afternoon i walked up the hill to my grand father's house, who had a coca cola cooler in the small building at the front of his property.  i asked for a coke, but he refused.
next, i continued up the hill to the small store at the intersection of cedar street and the paved highway.  there were a few men at a table outside the store, playing dominoes.  i hung around for a few minutes, but nobody offered to buy me a drink.  so, i headed back home.
as i walked down the hill, i was on the north side of cedar street.  but as i neared my cousin's house, i angled across the road to the opposite side because i didn't like walking past the deep ravine that bordered their property.
on two earlier occasions i had seen a large hairy ape-like man amongst the kudzu in that ravine.  although the creature had never threatened me, i was afraid to get too close.
i was about halfway across the dirt road when i was struck in the forehead by a bright narrow beam of light from above.  the beam was less than two inches in diameter.  it made no sound; nor had any "feel."  but, it was amazingly bright to be seen during a mid afternoon.
i gazed skyward and saw a large gray disc suspended very high over the back yard of my home.
immediately, i was lifted into the sky at a very fast speed.  actually, i did not have the sensation of being lifted.  rather, it was a sensation of "falling" up.
my memory is clouded about the ensuing details.  i seem to recall being greeted by at least three persons inside the craft.  i can't describe what they looked like.  i'm assuming they did not look like "monsters" because i did not panic.
i recall being on a table; and something sharp being stuck into my left nostril.  it wasn't painful; but it was uncomfortable.
i also recall being told that it was a beneficial procedure.  they weren't speaking words.  we were communicating via "thoughts."
i was also told to not tell anybody what had happened.  they also told me that the hairy creature in the ravine would not harm me.
next thing i recall, i was inside my house, standing behind a sheer curtain in the parlor.  i don't know how i got there.
that night, i woke up in the middle of the night and saw the hairy creature standing next to my bed.  he was so tall, his head bumped against the light bulb that was hanging from the ceiling.  next to him was a shorter, similarly hairy woman holding a baby creature.  the hair on the adults laid flat on their bodies.  the hair on the baby was "fuzzy" and stood away from its body.
suddenly the baby jumped from its mother's arms and bounced onto my bed.  she reached down to pick him up, and the small creature peed on my bed as it was being lifted.
the father seemed perturbed about the incident, and the three of them exited my room, went through the parlor, and out the front door.
i never again saw any hairy creatures.  but for the next ten years i suffered from chronic nosebleeds and boils on my body.
during those years, i often "left my body" and flew around during the night.  sometimes when i returned to my body, i would jolt so hard, it would bounce me out of bed.
i never spoke of these things to anyone.  i tried to forget they even happened.  i grew up in an area and in an era when things like ufos were not even discussed.  it wasn't until much later in life that i became curious.
after high school, the nosebleeds became rare.  but, sometime around the year 2005, i began to notice something inside my left nostril.  it felt almost like a small pimple.  by 2009, that pimple inside my nose had begun sprouting something that resembled a stiff hair.  i tried using trimmers to cut the "hair" but it would not cut.  one day i grabbed a pair of tweezers and yanked it out.
it was not a hair.  removing that thing was very painful.  it looked like a section of thick monofilament fishing line.  maybe 40 or 50 pound test line.  it was more than an inch long, although less than a quarter inch had been visible when i tried removing it.
i tossed it into the trash.  as mentioned earlier, i never thought too much about ufos.  as an adult, i plodded along as a soldier, a commercial fisherman, and a pest control technician.  nothing special about me.
in 2013 i got throat cancer.  the treatments nearly killed me.  until the cancer, i was an extremely healthy person.  i did not have a primary doctor.  i was never sick.  the only time i saw a doctor was when i had injuries.  the only times i missed work was when i was a bit too hungover from alcohol; and that was rare.
i am filing this report because things are only now becoming more clear in my memory about unexplained things that happened in my life.  i am curious to know whether or not i might have had contact with alien beings.  
thanks for being available to hear from folks like myself.  i apologize for not being able to provide better details.
sincerely, d.D.
content.summary: Around the age of five, i was "beamed" up to a ufo where something was inserted into my nostril.

content.detailedDescription: I was smoking a ciggeret around 1 am on my front porch then out of no were i saw a huge black weird shape i can't describe it but i can draw it the planes were muffling the noise of the low buzz the ship made i imediatly sent a text to my best friend who lives 25kn by car away from me and he saw it as well a a couple min before i did very scary very very scary
content.summary: Hovered barley over houses then kept going it was quiet under the noise of planes

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i witnessed the ufo over kirtland air force base, albuquerque nm on aug 8, 1980. i was 11 y/o, my brother was 14.My brother and i shared a room together in our house on 1719 17th loop on kirtland air force base. we were in bed at the time we witnessed the event. i was almost asleep when i was awaken by a very, very, incredible bright white bluish light that illuminated our entire house. at first i thought it might have been the security police were shining a very bright spotlight into our house. there wasn't any cars around and there were no aircraft in the air. it was totally silent, we knew it wasn't a helicopter, or any other aircraft. we had lived on air force bases our entire lives. it was not an aircraft that we were familiar with at the time or since. it was so bright it lit up our entire yard, in fact it lit up the whole neighborhood with a white bluish tinted light. we could not look at the craft, the light was way too bright to look at. it was like staring into a lit strobe light that was constantly on. it seemed that it was hovering over our house. i became very frightened and pulled my covers to my bed over my head. the light was so bright i could still see it through my blankets. i also noticed my blankets were sparking with electricity. i am unsure if the static was natural or craft related. but i think it was the light that created it. i don't know how long the light was there. i don't remember falling asleep and the last thing i remember was i was very, very frightend. no one we talked to saw it or they wouldn't talk about it. every since this has happened i feel something strange happened to us. i just don't know what, and have been bothered by this since it happened.
content.summary: Witnessed ufo aug 8, 1980 over kirtland afb albuquerque, nm. my father was in the air force, my brother and i saw the ufo over our house on the base.

content.detailedDescription:
1> i was in my bed, and i was sleeping.
2> a bright green glow filled my room.
3> i thought i was dreaming.
4> there was just a green glow that lit my entire room up coming from outside the window. i looked over to the wall and saw an odd shape that was being projected from whatever shining the light and it began to spin slowly and gradually speed up.
5> i was terrified, being only around 13 at the time i had no idea what was going on. i watched the shape spin around for a minute or two and the whole time i was too afraid to move. there was absolutely no sound, my bed is pretty creaky when you move around in it and sitting up i didn't hear anything, i couldn't even hear myself breathing.
6> i don't remember. i don't know if i fell asleep or not, i just remember seeing the light, and then i woke up the next morning and that's all i could recall from the night before.
content.summary: Green light shining through bedroom window projecting geometric shapes

content.detailedDescription:
I walked along the railroad tracks near hamburg mainstation. it was a clear sunny day and i take a look at the blue sky.
i saw 5 objects thats fly in a triangle formation. the objects looks silver/chrome metalic too me and not like normal planes or helicopters.
they fly straight horizentally in a close formation and than they instandly switched from horizontally to vertically. there was no curve seeable only direct from horizontal to vertical in a 90 degree angle without loosing formation or distance between it.
after a few secounds they loose there formation, speed up very fast and disapears vertical in the sky.
i had clear sighting on this objects but loose the sight in one secound after they speed up faster than any vehicle, plane or what ever i see.
it looks like speed up from 150 km/h to something around 2000 km/h or more instandly.
there was no emission seeable and i dont know a plane or jet without any seeable emmision.
content.summary: Triangle formation thats change direction 90° in formation and than speed up in air

content.detailedDescription:
As a child, i became interested in astronomy and my mom bought a telescope for me as a birthday gift. hence, as my birthday is in september, this would have happened in october or november 1972.

i had been fascinated by the rings of saturn and used to watch it every night, up into the middle of the night, which explains my nights without much sleep before going to school, and my poor grades at that time.

i had heard a friend tell me that jupiter was going to be more visible in the night sky and we should have a look. i never checked astronomically, the verity of my friend's statement. my brother (now deceased) and an old friend who had suggested this with myself & telescope went to an undeveloped part of the neighborhood nearby, where there was a rising hill, sort of like a butte that we see here in sd.

we climbed up and tried to focus a telescope according to star maps, and this object, glowing yellow-orange came to light as described above.

we grabbed our things and ran home frightened without stopping.

my parents said i was nuts and my mom asked if i had been smoking marijuana. i emphatically refuted her accusation.

i never mentioned the story again. i did not want to be called crazy.

this memory only came to mind when i recalled my past experience, more recently.

this is a weak report, as it was so long ago. i am nearly 59 now, but have 
never forgotten the incident.
content.summary: Glowing, yellow-gold disk

content.detailedDescription:
So i was headed back from the drycleaners. a close friend has a drycleaner in bogota,nj. i have the keys to the store so i usually take and pick up my dry cleaner during off hours.

i'm heading home, and i stopped to fill up the tire at the local gas station as my low air pressure light turned on. anyways, i jump on route 80 west to start heading home. i'm driving fine, and ready to jump on the garden state parkway south to exit 157 which is route 20 and 21, my direct route for home. so in the process of my getting on the exit lane to jump on the garden state parkway, i notice something hovering over the sky. at first i though it was an airplane, then i notice it was not moving. it was an unusual shape, this object looked like a cross, but all four wings if we want to call it that had a circle light towards the edge of each wing, four lights total.. the size of the wings were even, the lights on them were bigger then average aircraft lights (well at least the one we are use to see). the object appeared to be very dark, maybe black in color. the only reason why i could tell the shape is because the entire sky had a purplish color to it, and the shape was outlined and definitely stood out in the sky. so as i'm taking the exit, i want to be safe driving, there is a guy tailgating me because at this point i'm slowing down trying to find a safe spot on the shoulder to park so i can take a picture of this object. i can catch the object in between the tree lines now, and can barely see it... as i find a good spot to park, i look at the sky, i have full view of it, ny skyline and all, and the object is not there anymore, it just disappeared. i could not tell where did it go. there was absolutely no trace of it. the eerie part about it is that there was no other flying objects (helicopters or small planes) in the sky, i mean you can tell other commercial jets on the horizon, but none around the air space that this object was located in.

now, i know you get thousands of report a day... i am 41 years old, i am a system admin, and work with computers all day. personally, i have always loved the skies and stars, so i enjoy glazing up from time to time. i have never filed a report in no shape or form.

this to me, was a truly unidentified object. i wish i can tell you that it was a helicopter or a plane, but i have lived in this area almost all my entire adult life, and i am very familiar with the air traffic, and i have never experienced something like this. i was an amazing and scary feeling at the same time. 

you might just shove this report to corner, but i just needed to get it off my chest, because that butterfly feeling you get when you don't know what's going to happen is still in full effect as i write this, and needed to get it off my chest.

i really hope i wasn't the only one that saw this, and i hope it can help you in some way or other.

thank you for your time.
axilea vlachos
content.summary: Square / cross shaped object in paterson, new jersey

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my front porch in bremerton wa. in late fall. i was on my secound beer watching the air craft aprouching the glide path to seatac.            we had two trees one on either side of the yard, i looked up an observed a large triangle with a light on all three points. it blocked all images beyond its shape in the dark.Lights stars etc. i saw it pass between thr two trees as i have reference. i called to my wife who also whitnessed a sudden streak of light move east in the sky. we lived close to the bremerton shipyard and not far from the bangor sub base. probably not extra t.
content.summary: Isaw something i can not ever fore get

content.detailedDescription: 9:45 pm standing in my front yard looking straight up, body facing south looking at the stars with a pair of 10x42 binoculars. i noticed a fast moving dark v shaped craft with 5 lighter areas on it's left wing/side and 2 lighter areas on it's right wing/side on a north to south heading. it's shape stood out from the night sky as it was slightly  lighter in tone. i could tell this wasn't an airplane. i observed the craft throught the binoculars for approximately 5 seconds. there was no sound, no navigation lights, craft was traveling much faster than a commercial airliner.  the craft filled the field of view through the 10x42 binoculars. i wasn't afraid, i was slightly amazed, then i lost track of the craft due to trees.
content.summary: Looking straight up, body facing south, noticed a v shaped craft   traveling north to south

content.detailedDescription:
A buddy and i where exiting a pool hall approx. 11:50 pm on april 16, 2005, as we were was walking towards my car, i sensed a force or presence in the sky over my right shoulder that made the hair on my neck stand-up.  as i spun myself around southward towards the ste. mary river from the ontario side, which divides soo saint marie, michigan, directly over our city hall building, i pointed upwards and we both saw an aircraft, black in color, right before us it un-cloaked while slowing down to a hovering standstill and after a few seconds it cloaked again to a point it was invisible.  at that point its direction and speed were unknown. there was no sound emanating from the craft. total silence.

it appeared to resemble the lockheed sr-71 blackbird. either this is reversed technology being test on unsuspecting people or something else we cannot explain! i have been up and close to a sr-71 at an airshow and know what i saw.

my initial reaction was i wasn't sure what i saw actually happened. i had to confirm with my friend if he saw something and its behaviour, which he did confirm to me.
content.summary: A spacecraft uncloaked and cloaked while hovering with no sound

content.detailedDescription: I was 31 years old at the time and had left abilene tx traveling east on highway 20 to a home in the country located about thirty miles east of abilene.  we got out of the car together and as we looked at the sky above us we both saw the object silently and slowly fly over us and watched until it disappeared in the distance.  since we had left hwy 20 i think, but am not sure which way we turned off of highway 20, it's difficult to determine the direction the ufo was traveling, but i'm thinking it was going south / west. if important enough to know more precisely i'd be willing to be hypnotized by a professional hypnotist to recall the details more precisely.  because i was familiar with both civilian and military aircraft, i know that it wasn't either.  additionally, as i mentioned in your questionnaire, the lady i was with was married to a retired air force lt. colonel who piloted a b-52 and she was as astounded as i was.  i recall that she had a son who was years younger than me, a teenager at the time, and since i remember his full name, it's may be possible that he could be located and advise if either of his parents are still alive today.
content.summary: I was with a woman who was marrid with an ex-b-52 air force pilot and i was also prior air force.  the object was the size of a city block and we both saw it glide by.
content.locationName: Thirty Miles East of Abil, Texas

content.detailedDescription: While watch news 10 in philly..During their weather report i notice a object streaking up their screen so i watched again and recorded it.
content.summary: Small object on morning news

content.detailedDescription:
Sightings  report

i swear/affirm the statement made by me is factual, truthful and made without any duress or promises of anything in kind.  

on 08/10/2105, at approximately 19:13 hours; i was sitting in a chair facing a south-westerly direction in my backyard in hartford, alabama; in the county of geneva. while i was watching my dogs as they were utilizing the potty/restroom. i then notice that a passenger jet airplane was flying over from the south-westerly direction heading north-easterly over my residence. as, the airplane was passing you can hear the thrust of the jet in the distance. the airplane’s altitude was approximately 27/30,000 feet and it was leaving a contrail in its wake as it passed overhead. i watched the airplane's trajectory and contrail for approximately 2 or 3 minutes. 

something caught my peripheral vision on my right side and i noticed that something else was in the sky following the passenger jet airplane. i immediately called my wife from the bedroom where she was changing from her work clothes to lounging clothes. i wanted her to confirm to me that i was not seeing things or my eyes were playing tricks on me. upon her immediate arrival from the bedroom to the outside back concrete deck where i was now standing and watching the sky; i asked her what she was seeing in the sky, and explain it to me in her own words. the object was approximately 3½ miles behind the jet airplane and traveling at approximately 13/15,000 feet in altitude and following the same trajectory as the passenger jet.

the object was triangular in shape, it had no wings, it had no rotary attachments, it was not  leaving any contrail in it’s wake. the object was white or of a silver metallic color and material. the object was traveling at a constant speed and had no noise associated with it’s flight.As we both watched the jet airplane travel in the north-easterly direction; we called our son via cellphone whom lives 6 houses down the street and asked him to come outside his residence and look to the sky to see what we were seeing. the object was still traveling as if in tow towards the jet airplane’s direction. 

as we watched what was happening over our home, our son called us back from his cell phone and informed us to look back towards his residence that there were 2 more triangular, white or silver metallic objects traveling at the same altitude and trajectory as the first object pacing the passenger jet airplane. all of these objects were traveling at the same distance and speed of each other and approximately 4 to 5 miles apart.  these objects were like the first triangular object in which they to made no noise, had no markings, left no contrail and had no wings or rotary devices attached to them, either. all three objects were all similar in shape, height, color and descriptions. i am 48 years old. i have a bs-cj and a ms-shrm from troy university. i am retired from the united states military, army. i held a (ts/sbi w. sci access) top-secret security clearance with access to sensitive compartmentalized information and was read-on in the (prp) personnel reliability program for the confirmation, authorization and release of nuclear weapons. i also served as a comsec (communications security) security officer for confidential and above top secret items and documents for a nuclear weapons site. i was the trainer, tester and certifying officer for more than 40 military police and over 100 host national security forces in emergency training and duress procedures.
content.summary: 3 triangular white or silver metallic objects

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog around 11:45 pm eastern standard time and saw something glowing through the trees.  i walked up the hill to get a better look and saw, what i thought at first was the moon, but there were no stars out and it was country dark, i was having to use the flash light on my iphone to walk the dog.  the circular object was at first red, then got larger and turned yellow, i assume it was traveling toward me at the time, then it turned bright white and disappeared.
content.summary: I saw a circular object that glowed changing from red to orange to white and it took off

content.detailedDescription: Two gold organic looking orbs playfully glided over our heads during the world of color show at disneyland. unsure if orbs were in fact crafts or entities themselves. they almost seemed to be chasing and playing with one another. the sighting witness by my husband and myself left us both feeling very happy. the emotion and energy felt during the wirld of color show was very loving and joyful. i was thinking mono nets before seeing them that it would not surprise me if extra terrestrials flew by disneyland often to see the fireworks and the vibe or the thousands of people. the two were lower than most aircraft (maybe where a helicopter might be elevation wise) but they sort of intertwined as the glided past and just past disney border appeared to dissipate.
content.summary: Two gold organic looking orbs playfully glided over our heads during the world of color show at disney land.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in the hotel room balcony enjoying the sunset when suddenly i saw the ufo hovering the clouds.
content.summary: Disk  flying amidst clouds

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
While watching tv with my family, i was overcame with an atypical urge to go outside for some fresh air. after standing outside for a few minutes, my wife poked her head out our front door to inquire as to how and what i was doing. she interrupted herself mid-sentence to ask and point behind me, "what the hell is that"? 

to my amazement their was an extremely bright, white, disc shaped object, about 50 yrds away, and it was traveling about 20ft over the tree tops - moving from north to south so slowly it should have fallen from the sky like a rock. no noise, no marker lights. during this time i alerted several neighbors, 5 in total, and attempted to find a decent mobile phone camera. at some point the craft made an extreme right angle turn, which changed it's trajectory to east, and the vehicle gradually increased both speed and latitude until it eventually faded from sight. (a considerable time considering how bright the object was). during the sighting a black twin engine airplane flew in low from the west, seemed to approach the craft with haste, and did a u - turn once the disc made its right angle turn, while matching the speed and elevation change of the craft. the plane overflew the craft twice that we saw, and seemed to be following/observing the object from a distance. i've never seen any similar plane in the airspace around my home - and i search the skys daily. a truly unforgettable experience.
content.summary: Very bright white disc shaped object

content.detailedDescription: Around 3:00 in the morning i found myself laying in bed with a strange and peculiar feeling. i couldn't sleep so i decided to walk outside and smoke a cigarette. i live in the country so i am a frequent star and sky gazer. every night i follow the ursa major over the tree line and across the sky. well this morning as i found the ursa major i spotted a much brighter light in the sky. the craft appeared to be a bright star at first but as i further investigated it i found that it was emitting strange blue and green lights. it also appeared to sway back in forth while hovering. never completely still of visibly taking a course. i assume that it is monitoring the air force base close by. i immediately called my skeptical step father out for a second opinion in which he stated "it must be an airplane, or a star changing colors". i completely disagreed considering even while i tried to lay my head against something to make sure my eyes weren't playing tricks on me the craft still appeared to change colors and continued to sway back and forth. my step father and i went inside to try and find a device that could record it. we don't have a camera so i went outside with my laptop with built in webcam and started to record. i was visibly shaken and feeling lightheaded, as if i had just ran a marathon after smoking a pack of cigarettes. after recording the craft i walked back inside to review it and heard a strange electrical buzzing and hum that wasn't audible to me while i was recording. i went around the house to make sure nothing was on that could give me any sort of feedback and went outside and recorded a second video that had more of the strange feedback. at one point it even appeared to either give me a sideways view of a triangular craft (3 separate yellow/white lights in triangular form) and then they almost seemed to meet in the middle to make one object again blinking blue and green lights. the dogs in the neighborhood were barking and my animals didn't want to stay outside. it stuck around for almost 2 hours before completely disappearing. i tried to upload my videos but my laptop has been on the fritz ever since. i will try to upload later maybe through email.
content.summary: Hovering traingular ufo with pulsating blue/green lights

content.detailedDescription: I recently viseted mars earth and i went to the second most recent picture from curiosity and if you look at it really close you are going to see all way in your left side something that really  looks to my like an ufo aircraft.
content.summary: Mars earth

content.detailedDescription:
I was working in the lilley brook golf club bar and a few of the oldies were in late, not too much going on, so i decided to take a wander outside on the patio to get some air. this was around 10pm at night at the start of march gmt so very well dark by then and a pretty clear night. some high up thin clouds but a relatively bright night, quite cold and clear. 

i walked out onto the patio in front of the 2nd green, as you'd expect at that time there is no one else around. tall conifers and a willow stand about 300 yards in front of me and above them i see what at first i think is a very bright star, so i assumed it must be a planet, probably venus by the looks of it? but after a few seconds i noticed it was moving down and to the left slowly and seemed to be getting bigger, then it stopped for a few seconds. it then started to slowly descend down and to the left once again for about five to ten seconds and then it stopped once more. at this point it was obviously bigger than it had been when i'd first seen it. maybe nearly twice as big? it then from still slowly started moving over now to the right, in a smooth straight line (maybe very slightly curved downwards like a down facing bracket) level with the tops of the trees in front of me.

this all took around 30 seconds and the whole time the object stayed a bright white/slightly yellow colour, like a standard light bulb colour. it then moved quite far over to the right, further than where i had first seen it and it stopped above the trees, but now seemed slightly smaller once again. it then stayed there for about 15 to 20 seconds and then suddenly in a curved tick (right hand tick) shot off in about a quarter of a second. it's final motion appeared to very quickly and smoothly accelerate away and diminish in size in correspondence with it's acceleration in a curve, like the bottom right hand quarter circle disappearing into the night.

i remember not feeling panicked or freaked out but more like inquisitive and like "what on earth is/was that object?"... i stood out in the cold night on my own for a very short while then went back inside, briefly mentioned it to people inside but no one was too interested.


i'm not a religious person, i like to make decisions in my life based on real facts of our genuine understanding of how the universe works through science etc, and think there's always a rational explanation and so on... but this one really baffles me! i have a friend i know well who works along side military operations in the uk, and i'd noticed over the years he's always been very closed about his work when asked. a few weeks ago we happened to be on this very subject and he said he's been told there are objects on military radar that just disappear all the time. 

obviously no one actually knows the real facts..Whatever they may be?! could it be natural phenomenon, or drones sent by other life forms as we're doing to other nearby planets right now? who knows? all i know is this was my first ufo sighting of two strange ufo sightings in my life and i'm only 30! any more to come i wonder? :d
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Venus like object that slowly glided to several different places in the sky, getting larger/nearer then stopped for 15 sec and shot off in curved tick in under half a second.

content.detailedDescription:
Was at home watching television when i noticed a bright light on one of my cctv cameras. i then started watching it live and also went outside to see if i could see it better. it moved from side to side, was joined by other spheres and possibly was flying at a low altitude. i noticed that some of the spheres were changing colors and shape. it appeared to be "square" but i believe the camera's relatively low resolution may have caused this. at times, they also took on a triangle shape.  

watched from several hours and then they seemed to disappear so i then went to bed at approximately 12:45am. i checked the recording that the cctv made and determined it had been there earlier than i first saw it and had reappeared during the early hours of the 8th and then disappeared. it did not return the next night.

the sighting took place on the gila river indian reservation which is just south of my location.  my house which is on the side of a hill gives me a vantage point that one would not have if on the ground.

timing on one of the files:

10:53:40 sphere is on and flashing. 
10:54:34 second sphere moves in from the west (right)
10:54:48 spheres are very bright.  second sphere is changing colors
10:54:56 second sphere disappears
10:57:23 third sphere is seen approaching from the left(east) and is   located just below the 08 on the date. it is changing colors as well.

most of the "action" takes place in the same area.  i have uploaded a picture showing the location.  it is just south of a main highway between i-10 and maricopa, az.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Multiple spheres moving about during the night hours, joining and then separating
